creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Three bound volumes printed in xerography, three loose MS. with inscriptions in black ink pen, and a small portrait photograph, all contained within a manilla envelope with inscriptions and designs in black ink pen
medium: Xerography, black ink pen, offset lithography; bound volumes and loose ephemera in manilla envelope
title: Hellery Zine/Comic collection
